name: Cody Duell Smith
text:
Pizza was super good. Cheese loaded and super flavorful.
Called take out with a coupon for a free take out. There was a small confusion and they made the pizza a bit too small. They immediately made a new pizza to order and gave us both free of charge. Total process took less than 10 min.

name: Ally Cowdell
text: Such good pizza! Super cheesy and tasteful. Very filling and made for good leftovers. The cheese bread is also amazing!! Definitely worth trying instead of the usual Domino's or Pizza Hut.

name: Samuel Bradshaw
text: The first time I went to Blackjack was just because they were the closest pizza place. I was pleasantly surprised with the excellent quality and reasonable price. They're not quite as cheap as Little Caesars, but they're more generous with â€¦More

name: Corey Blaser
text: The pizza is always good, but the employees need to pay more attention to the order details. Italian dressing is not spicy ranch and I don't want all my pepperoni on a single slice of my medium pizza. When they get it right, they have one of the best pies in town.

name: Ben
text: Hard for a guy who worked in pizza for 15 years to say it was great but it was, loved there bread sticks and pizza but service needs some work. our pizza was left on the rack for 5min while waiting also everyone has long hair but only one â€¦More

name: Tyler Gilland
text: We had a gift certificate to get a free pizza.  The pizza was okay, not bad but not amazing.  About what you would expect for the cost so no issues there.  The staff however was a joke.  They had blaring music (I'm talking loud, like we â€¦More

name: Nancy Keeton
text: I am glad we found this place in Utah county. I really like their pizzas. Service is always prompt and their prices very competitive.

name: Mike Towne
text: The address certainly matched our apartment, but the order was for a Caleb Green, order given at 7:19. I had a directory for everyone in the apartments, and there wasn't a single person with the orderer's name here, so we couldn't even â€¦More

name: Jordann Hans
text: My husband and I loved Black Jack Pizza! The thing that really stood out to us about this pizza place is that the pizza wasn't drowning in grease like many of the other popular pizza joints. Thanks Black Jack!

name: Brian Millerberg
text: The employees at this BlackJack Pizza have always been very polite and on time with my orders. They also offer amazing deals to the apartments nearby, which helps a lot with local relations.

name: David Valentine
text: Super duper hard to find. food is pretty good but nothing special. $2 delivery fee. thats what happens when people don't tip their drivers.

name: Andrew Record
text: Never actually stepped foot in this Pizza place, but I have been to the laundromat next door, and one time while i was there a friendly delivery guy brought in some pizza to everyone who was doing laundry, It was very nice of him, I will for sure have to order more of their pizza, it is really good!

name: Zak Kandare
text: i gave it 4 stars for customer service. The pizza was alright. Honestly I felt like I would get a better deal at little Caesar's. It tastes good but the size isn't that great for the price.

name: Chelsee Goode
text: The price is awesome.....the workers were nice and they made an excellent pizza, lots of cheese. I ordered spinach, artichoke feta pizza, it was delicious!

name: Traes Daniels-Brown
text: BlackJack Pizza is by far the most amazing pizza in Provo! We go there at least a couple times a week! The Staff is super cool and friendly and the pizza is always fresh. Don't go anywhere else TBH !!!

name: John Hawke
text: I ordered at 10 pm I ended up with black chicken wings to a crisp and a salad with onions that were pealed and placed in the bowl.

name: Sadie Pulsipher
text: We pulled into provo tired and hungry.  And these guys delivered. They had a new guy and they all made sure he,was successful in his new job. I'd definitely recommend these guys to anyone.  Thanks for feeding the hangry..

name: jessibell 1234
text: This place was prompt, friendly, and the day manager Joe have us free samples of some incredible pizzas he has made + he gave us a free 2 litre bottle of soda for free! If every trip there could be like this one is eat there every day!

name: Jackson Alvey
text: The best cheap pizza around. Spend the extra dollar or two because it's miles beyond Little Caesar's.

name: Sharielle Hawker
text: My fiancÃ© and I found a deal on their home page where is was a large two topping pizza with cheese bread and ice cream for 16.99. We tried ordering it online but apparently the only place that the deal exists is on the home page...but you â€¦More

name: Cole Shelley
text: We love blackjack! Quality pizza and amazing service!

name: Paul Maxfield
text: Blackjack Pizza.  It's the best/only place for pizza in Provo!  Every time I have pizza anywhere else, I can't help myself, but to compare it with Blackjack Pizza.

name: Jared Webb
text: You can't buy something without giving them your phone number.  Pizza is ok, but I have to ask why anyone would go here when Dominoes has gotten so cheap and Little Ceaser's is cheaper.  Both are around the corner and are better pizza.

name: Corey Harper
text: The pizza is good, but when I went to go to the store on a Tuesday night, online it said that it was open until 10 PM, but the sign said it closed at 5:30.  That's a BIG difference, you should get that updated!

name: Rich Farnes
text: Delicious pizza. Great quality, taste and price.

name: Calvin Berg
text: Fantastic pizza very well priced and great customer service

name: Emily Nowers
text: Always so pleased with this place. Always a go to when it comes to Friday nights.

name: Jonathan Allawos
text: Well first of all, I always order pick up and they're awesome on the phone, good and easy people, really nice when you are there to pick up, great pizza for the best pizza in Utah, they have my vote over the other guys any day

name: Bond Denhalter
text: They were very accommodating to my special circumstances and gave great customer service, and for $5 the pizza was a great deal and VERY DELICIOUS!

name: Josh Durr
text: The pizza was smashed into the side of the box and all the cheese was stuck to the top of the pizza box. No point in eating it so just threw it in the trash thanks.

name: Brian Lewis
text: Really cheap pizza. Not the best quality, but if you're looking for quick and inexpensive pizza in Provo, this is a good choice.

name: M. Jared Habel
text: this is the best pizza in town, you can't compare to dominos or little ceasers, try Melissa's meat lovers, it's beats dominos hands down.

name: Devon Mortensen
text: I was appalled to watch one of your employees pick toppings off the pizzas and eat them while he packages them up to go out for delivery. Then eat some of the chicken I ordered, package it up and give it to me.

name: Long2757
text: Excellent pan crust pizza and breadsticks. Will be ordering again for lunch since it's close to where I work.

name: Marilee Isaacson
text: Yummy pizza for a good price

name: Q Wolfert
text: Good for an inexpensive pizza.

name: Brandon Ku
text: Delicious! Always on time, AMAZING service! Favorite Delivery in Provo!

name: Ryan Roberts
text: Good pizza awesome cheese bread.

name: Kryshelle Tanner
text: My mom works there ðŸ˜€

name: Luke Alder
text: Great Pizza!

name: Van Gaffney
text: Great fresh pizza

name: Sean Burrows
text: Good gourmet pizza!

name: Kyle Adams
text: If it was a little cheaper it'd be great
